php.LBL_POLAND_VAT_PAYER_DESC: The service allows you to verify whether the entity is an active, exempt, or unregistered VAT taxpayer in Poland.
php.LBL_POLAND_GUS_DESC: Download information about entities of the national economy of Poland from the REGON Registry.
php.LBL_VIES_DESC: Checks if the business entity has a valid VAT-EU number for intra-community transactions within the European Union.
php.LBL_POLAND_NCR_DESC: Get company data from the Polish National Court Register
php.LBL_UNITED_KINGDOM_CH_DESC: Check company in government register of companies for the UK
